Description: Three beads made in different shapes and materials. A: One lentoid-shaped bead with incised lines forming a floral decoration on both sides. Made of light green faience, now brownish. B: One spherical bead made of glass, now corroded in a pearlescent colour, greenish colour visible underneath. C: One flattened spherical bead with an edge running around the outer surface, made of turquoise faience.
Acquisition notes: Formerly housed by the Birmingham Museum and Art Gallery and the EES London.
